name: Gift A Yog Some Christmas
description:
The Yogscast have been spreading christmas cheer for many years. This christmas, give a yog some christmas.

In this short point and click adventure, give Simon and Lewis what they like (or don't like), as christmas gifts!

You are Dave YogNau(gh)t, but do you have the balls?

Controls:

  • Move with the Directional Keys (Left Arrow, Right Arrow, or A and D)
  • Click on objects to pick them up. Click anywhere to put them down.
  • Touch the top end of the screen with your cursor to bring the drop down Present Gifting Menu.

Try to give the Yogs the best gifts you can find!
